cmdt:csv:convert.description: Convert csv file to xml custom metadata records
examples:
$ sfdx cmdt:csv:convert example.csv --type Example__mdt
10 of 10 Custom metadata records were converted.

$ sfdx cmdt:csv:convert example.csv --type Example__mdt --mapping mapping.txt
10 of 10 Custom metadata records were converted.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

type.name: type
type.description: api name of custom metadata type

cmdt:field:list.description: Show list of fields of custom metadata
examples:
$ sfdx cmdt:field:list --type Example__mdt
{ fullName: 'ExampleField__c',
caseSensitive: 'false',
externalId: 'false',
fieldManageability: 'DeveloperControlled',
label: 'ExampleFieldLabel',
length: '255',
required: 'true',
type: 'Text',
unique: 'true'
}
